title: Skill Tree viewport & flow polish
description: Responsive fixes for the overcrowded Skill Tree (viewport auto-fit, hover spacing, arrow rendering) plus a unified student flow that ties the dashboard, skill selection, and practice sessions together.

chain.task: Align scope/OKR impact, lock timelines, and publish UX brief (layout goals, target devices, success metrics).
Produce responsive mockups + interaction specs (hover, tooltips, seed fallback messaging) and update copy for merged dashboard.
Implement SkillTreeGraph auto-fit + spacing changes, collision-safe tooltips, arrow rendering, and integrate the unified student/skill flow.
Expose/confirm practice session parameters for skill-scoped launches and surface any metadata UX needs (e.g., tier labels, prerequisites).
Regression test desktop/mobile for viewport fit, hover clarity, arrow alignment, and the new practice launch flow, attaching evidence.
Final integration review ensuring UX spec adherence, code quality, and instrumentation coverage before release.
